title: Prahlad Lodhi - Wikipedia
snippet: Prahlad Lodhi is an Indian politician from Madhya Pradesh. He is a two time elected Member of the Madhya Pradesh Legislative Assembly from 2018 and 2023, representing Pawai Assembly constituency as a Member of the Bharatiya Janata Party. Political career

title: Pawai Election Result 2023 LIVE Updates and Highlights: Prahlad Lodhi ...

title: MP: BJP meets governor over MLA Prahlad Lodhi's disqualification
snippet: Prahalad Lodhi was disqualified as an MLA after he was found guilty of attacking a revenue officer in 2014 by a lower court. Lodhi has been sentenced to two years of imprisonment. Madhya Pradesh Assembly Secretariat on Saturday announced a disqualification of BJP MLA from Pawai Prahlad Lodhi.

title: Madhya Pradesh MLA List 2024 | Madhya Pradesh Vidhan Sabha Seats
snippet: The Madhya Pradesh Legislative Assembly / Madhya Pradesh Vidhan Sabha is the unicameral legislature of the state of Madhya Pradesh in India. There are 230 seats in the house filled by directly elected from the single-seat constituencies.

title: Prahlad Lodhi - Pawai, Madhya Pradesh Legislative Assembly - Akhand App
snippet: Prahlad Lodhi is the member of legislative assembly of Madhya Pradesh from Pawai constituency. He won the elections for MLA in 2018 as a candidate of Bharatiya Janata Party. Personal details Prahlad Lodhi is 46 years old. His education level is Class VIII. Wealth, profession and criminal cases Total assets of Prahlad Lodhi are ₹21.15 lakh.

title: Rahul Singh Lodhi, BJP's Candidate From Damoh Lok Sabha Constituency
snippet: Immediately after the declaration, Lodhi started his election tour. He has been visiting senior leaders of the party. Rahul Singh Lodhi was elected as Congress MLA in 2018 from the assembly constituency Damoh. He then resigned the MLA post and joined BJP. In the by-election that followed, Lodhi faced defeat from Ajay Tandon of Congress.
